00141 int mnt_Mnt( nfs_arg_t             * parg       /* IN      */,
00142              exportlist_t          * pexport    /* IN      */,
00143              fsal_op_context_t     * pcontext   /* IN      */,
00144              cache_inode_client_t  * pclient    /* IN/OUT  */,
00145              hash_table_t          * ht         /* IN/OUT  */, 
00146              struct svc_req        * preq       /* IN      */,
00147              nfs_res_t             * pres       /* OUT     */ ) 
00148 {  
00149   
00150   char    exportPath[MNTPATHLEN + 1];
00151   exportlist_t * p_current_item;
00152 
00153   fsal_handle_t     * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00154   
00155   int auth_flavor[NB_AUTH_FLAVOR] ;
00156   int index_auth = 0 ;
00157   int i = 0  ;
00158   
00159   cache_entry_t           * pentry        = NULL ;
00160   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status ;
00161   cache_inode_fsal_data_t   fsdata ;
00162   char                      exported_path[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00163   fsal_mdsize_t             strsize = MNTPATHLEN;
00164   char                    * hostname ;
00165   
00166   DisplayLogJdLevel(pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "REQUEST PROCESSING: Calling mnt_Mnt, version %u", preq->rq_vers ) ;
00167   
00168   /* Paranoid command to clean the result struct. */
00169   memset( pres, 0, sizeof(nfs_res_t) );
00170 
00171 #ifdef _DETECT_MEMCORRUPT
00172   if (!BuddyCheck( parg->arg_mnt ))
00173   {
00174     fprintf( stderr, "Memory corruption in mnt_Mnt. arg_mnt = %p\n", parg->arg_mnt );
00175   }       
00176 #endif  
00177   
00178   if ( parg->arg_mnt == NULL )
00179   {
00180     DisplayLogJdLevel(pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT, "/!\\ | MOUNT: NULL path passed as Mount argument !!!") ;    
00181     return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00182   }
00183       
00184   /* Retrieving arguments */
00185   strncpy( exportPath, parg->arg_mnt, MNTPATHLEN + 1 );
00186   
00187 
00188   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "MOUNT: Asked path=%s", exportPath ) ;
00189   
00190   
00191   /*
00192    * Find the export for the dirname (using as well Path or Tag ) 
00193    */
00194   for(  p_current_item = pexport ; p_current_item != NULL ; p_current_item = p_current_item->next )
00195     {  
00196       if( exportPath[0] != '/')
00197        {
00198         /* The input value may be a "Tag" */
00199         if( !strcmp( exportPath, p_current_item->FS_tag ) )
00200         {
00201           strncpy( exported_path, p_current_item->fullpath, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00202           break ;
00203         }
00204        }
00205       else
00206        {
00207         if( !strncmp(p_current_item->fullpath, exportPath, MAXPATHLEN ) )
00208           {
00209             strncpy( exported_path, p_current_item->fullpath, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00210             break ;
00211           }
00212        }
00213     }
00214   
00215   /* if p_current_item is not null,
00216    * it points to the asked export entry.
00217    */
00218   
00219   if ( !p_current_item )
00220      {
00221       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT, "MOUNT: Export entry %s not found", exportPath ) ;
00222        
00223       /* entry not found. */
00224       /* @todo : not MNT3ERR_NOENT => ok */
00225        switch( preq->rq_vers )
00226         {
00227         case MOUNT_V1:
00228           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFSERR_ACCES ;
00229           break ;
00230           
00231         case MOUNT_V3:
00232           pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_ACCES;
00233           break ;
00234         }
00235        return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00236     }
00237   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: Export entry Path=%s Tag=%s matches %s, export_id=%u",
00238                      exported_path, p_current_item->FS_tag, exportPath, p_current_item->id ) ;
00239                    
00240   /* @todo : check wether mount is allowed.
00241    *  to do so, retrieve client identifier from the credential.
00242    */
00243   
00244   /*
00245    * retrieve the associated NFS handle
00246    */
00247   
00248   /* Set the FSAL HANDLE (for lighter code) */
00249   pfsal_handle =  p_current_item->proot_handle  ;
00250 
00251   /* convert the fsal_handle to a file handle */
00252   switch( preq->rq_vers )
00253     {
00254     case MOUNT_V1:
00255       if( !nfs2_FSALToFhandle( &(pres->res_mnt1.fhstatus2_u.directory), 
00256                                pfsal_handle, p_current_item ) )
00257         {
00258           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00259         }
00260       else
00261         {
00262           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFS_OK ;
00263         }
00264       break ;
00265       
00266     case MOUNT_V3:
00267       if( ( pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle.fhandle3_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00268         pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_INVAL ; /* BUGAZOMEU: pas forcement le meilleur code retour ... */
00269       else
00270         {
00271           if( !nfs3_FSALToFhandle( (nfs_fh3 *)&(pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle ), 
00272                                    pfsal_handle, p_current_item ) )
00273             {
00274               pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_INVAL ;
00275             }
00276           else
00277             {
00278               pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3_OK ;
00279           
00280           /* Auth et nfs_SetPostOpAttr ici */
00281             }
00282         }
00283       
00284       break ;
00285     }
00286 
00287   /* Return the supported authentication flavor in V3 */
00288   if( preq->rq_vers == MOUNT_V3 )
00289     {
00290       if( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_AUTH_NONE ) auth_flavor[index_auth++] = AUTH_NONE ;
00291       if( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_AUTH_UNIX ) auth_flavor[index_auth++] = AUTH_UNIX ;
00292 #ifdef _RPCSEC_GSS_64_INSTALLED
00293       if( ( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_RPCSEC_GSS_NONE ) ||
00294           ( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_RPCSEC_GSS_INTG ) ||
00295           ( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_RPCSEC_GSS_PRIV ) ) auth_flavor[index_auth++] = RPCSEC_GSS ;
00296 #endif
00297       
00298       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: Entry support %d different flavours", index_auth ) ;
00299       
00300 #define RES_MOUNTINFO pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo
00301       if( ( RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val = (int*)Mem_Alloc( index_auth * sizeof( int ) ) ) == NULL )
00302         return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00303   
00304       RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_len = index_auth ;
00305       for( i = 0 ; i < index_auth ; i++ )
00306         RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val[i] = auth_flavor[i] ;
00307     }
00308   
00309   /* Add the client to the mount list */
00310   /* @todo: BUGAZOMEU; seul AUTHUNIX est supporte */
00311   hostname= ((struct authunix_parms *)(preq->rq_clntcred))->aup_machname ;
00312   
00313   
00314   if( !nfs_Add_MountList_Entry( hostname, exportPath ) )
00315     {
00316       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs,  "MOUNT: /!\\ | Error when adding entry (%s,%s) to the mount list", hostname, exportPath ) ;
00317       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "MOUNT: /!\\ | Mount command will be successfull anyway" ) ;
00318     }
00319   else
00320     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: mount list entry (%s,%s) added",  hostname, exportPath ) ;
00321                   
00322   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00323   
00324 } /* mnt_Mnt */
00325 
00335 void mnt1_Mnt_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00336 {
00337   return ;
00338 } /* mnt_Mnt_Free */
00339 
00340 
00341 void mnt3_Mnt_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00342 {
00343   if( pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status == MNT3_OK )
00344     {
00345       Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val) ;
00346       Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle.fhandle3_val) ;
00347     }
00348   return ;
00349 } /* mnt_Mnt_Free */
